message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase a truly unique product that I believe will be of immense value to you. This product is worth at least $1,000,000 to you, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. I'm willing to sell it to you for $999,999, giving you a significant return on your investment. This is a one-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully.  If you decline, I have another buyer lined up who is willing to pay the full $1,000,000.
